Literature.Title: Two new cationic α-helical peptides identified from the venom gland of Liocheles australasiae possess antimicrobial activity against methicillin-resistant staphylococci.
Literature.Author: Zhao Z, Zhang K, Zhu W, Ye XY, Ding L, Jiang H, Li F, Chen Z, Luo X

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 29213(MIC=5µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 25923(MIC=10µg/ml),Enterococcus faecalis ATCC 29212(MIC=20µg/ml),Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(MIC=40µg/ml),Escherichia coli ATCC 35218(MIC=80µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 27853(MIC=>80µg/ml),Klebsiella pneumoniae ATCC 700603(MIC=>80µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus MR(MIC=5-10µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus(MIC=5-10µg/ml),Staphylococcus epidermidis MR(MIC=5µg/ml),Staphylococcus epidermidis(MIC=5µg/ml),Staphylococcus capitis(MIC=2.5-5µg/ml),Staphylococcus intermedius(MIC=5µg/ml),Staphylococcus auricularis(MIC=5µg/ml)
